title: Book Category Research Like a Pro for Amazon KDP with Publisher Rocket

tactics.name: category_search
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify optimal book categories by analyzing sales thresholds and category visibility
steps: Access Publisher Rocket's category search tool
Filter categories by main topic (e.g., business and money)
Differentiate selectable categories from ghost categories
Evaluate sales thresholds for ranking potential
source_quotes: Categories are essentially your book shelf placement...

tactics.name: category_sales_threshold_analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify categories with achievable sales thresholds for top rankings
steps: Check daily sales requirements for top positions
caveats: Categories with high publisher presence may require more marketing spend
source_quotes: you would have to sell 178 books a day to be number one

heuristics.name: sales_threshold_heuristic
heuristics.condition: If category sales thresholds are excessively high, prioritize lower competition categories
source_quotes: You would need to sell 13 books a day...

heuristics.name: low_competition_niche_boost
heuristics.condition: If category has low review counts and publisher dominance < 50%, prioritize it
source_quotes: commercial policy only has 21% of it taken up by publishers

claims.statement: Amazon KDP categories determine book visibility and ranking potential
source_quotes: Categories differ between paperbacks and ebooks...

claims.statement: Major publishers dominate 85% of economics category books

niche_patterns.description: Niche combinations with low review counts and specific constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Targets underserved markets with minimal competition
source_quotes: Ghost categories are difficult for shoppers to find...
